card_one.title: Reliability
card_one.text: Assure users that every traveler is carefully verified and rated to ensure secure transactions.

card_two.title: Savings
card_two.text: Enable senders to save on traditional shipping fees by leveraging the pre-planned trips of travelers.

card_three.title: Traceability
card_three.text: Enable users to track their packages at every stage of the journey.

card_four.title: Flexibility
card_four.text: Travelers can offer their trips and indicate the destinations they are heading to, providing senders with a diverse range of delivery options.
